description: Sexy Mike Rivers has been hitting the gym hard and practicing his moves with his boyfriend cause he's dying to finally win a match here on NK. His opponent, Ethan Ayers, is brand new to NK and he plans to use his nude, erotic wrestling experience to take Mike Rivers down and prove he's got what it takes to be a winner on NK. Will Mike's new confidence and improved skills be enough to secure him his first victory and give him the right to fuck the hell out of Ethan with his big, fat dick? Or will Ethan's pound Mike into the mat and pound his tight hole wide open with his own huge cock?
title: Mike Rivers vs Ethan Ayers
